subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: New Zealand crossed the finish line Tuesday with a 25-second advantage over Alinghi and, more important, a 2-1 lead in a series that is taking this old competition in a refreshing direction.
snippet: New Zealand crossed the finish line Tuesday with a 25-second advantage over Alinghi and, more important, a 2-1 lead in a series that is taking this old competition in a refreshing direction.
